I've been testing JUnit 4 with Ant 1.7alpha(from svn).
I used both JUnit (n=
ot in 3.8 compatible mode) and JUnitReport targets.
It works fine.

Is this=
 the way forward for Ant integration?
In this list, I read that you were th=
inking about separating the JUnit 
tasks from Ant.

Regards, Jan
